nodes.text: Hellena Tano was a female Togruta living during the Eternal Empire conquest. By 3630 BBY she was wanted by the Eternal Empire for murder, slander and inciting treason. Her wanted poster was displayed in the Overwatch.
Hellena Tano appears during Chapter 10: Anarchy in Paradise of Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire on a wanted holo-poster.
